Gold.description: The highest form of coined currency.

Copper.description: The lowest form of coined currency

Animal Fur.description: A fur pelt harvested from a killed animal

Gambeson.description: A padded defensive jacket constructed out of linen or wool. Can protect the wearer more than one might think.

Spear.description: A weapon with a long shaft and a pointed tip. A common and useful weapon due to its long reach.

Dagger.description: An tool that can be also used as an easily concealed weapon. Can be very dangerous in the right hands.
